### Summary

Is there a way to set package-specific environment variables when doing "spack load". More specifically, 
after I do 
spack install gptune
spack load gptune
I would like an additional environment variable "GPTUNE_INSTALL_PATH" to be set automatically. Is this a currently supported feature or not?
